price: 82 mais décrète toujours le triomphe de la vérité, n’en déplaise aux criminels. »
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
